attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded it to support trump😀but it does not work🤒 i was trying to use it then my dog started talking🤓 and i was like 👁👄👁 what even is this and even worse my children started CRYING!!!!!! JAILLLLL these are BULL EYES HIGH SCHOOL BULL EYES😡

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I can attend the next rally to support my amazing 🤪president but it keeps on glitching😡🤬it takes me out of the app when I go on it🙄TRASH🤮🤢✨🧚🏼‍♀️💕✌🏼

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: The the worst thing when I opened . The app should be taken down and never to seen again

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: Doesn’t function very well at all. The pictures also make me very uncomfortable and scared.

attributes.title: Gross and unnecessary
attributes.review: There is literally no point to this app. All it wants is your information and to give you biased political information

attributes.title: Stupid
attributes.review: This app glitches all the time and never works. There’s no point to it either

attributes.title: Hate the app
attributes.review: Everytime I go onto the app it freezes and won’t let me click on anything 👎🏻

attributes.title: Absolutely DISGUSTED
attributes.review: There was literal cold pornography on this app I am disgusted and appalled. There is a link to the full pdf of MEIN KAMPF in the menu as well as the communist manifesto. This app is a disgrace and I demand that it be removed. This app is a massive Cheeto colored stain on the American image. Tragic 🧚🏿✨🌿🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: I’m traumatized for life 😭
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw an orange as a human and with a sign that all lives all matter and say homophobic things and being a racist against the Hispanic culture 😭🤢😷

attributes.title: A fascist app
attributes.review: Trump is a fascist. When opening this app you will find a Cheeto looking Oompa Loompa asking for supporters. This Oompa Loompa is a threat to society and America. I hope we Gen Zs can take this app down. This one is for the bigot in office. 🖕🏽
